metadata.synopsis: Shadowheart confronts Viconia about her past and potentially the leadership of the cult itself. Alternatively, she may be here to free her parents, if she has abandoned Shar. The player can support her efforts and help her defeat Viconia, or else betray her.
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1. Enter the grotto with Shadowheart2. Approach Viconia3. Dialog starts

2.speaker: Viconia DeVir
2.text: They already heard how you disgraced yourself before Lady Shar. How she marked you as the enemy. But it is quite another thing for them to see it for themselves.
2.context: CinematicNodeContext: Viconia awaits SH. A sharran audience in the wings murmurs their disgust as SH appears

5.speaker: Viconia DeVir
5.text: I am very glad you decided to return. A cautionary tale such as yours will be studied by Lady Shar's initiates for years to come.
5.context: InternalNodeContext: Node is optional if LOW_SharGrotto_ConfrontViconia_NoShadowheart previously covered the topic of the artefact sufficiently,

121.speaker: Viconia DeVir
121.text: But perhaps I can make a case for some small measure of mercy. Give me the artefact, and I can at least make this quick.
121.context: InternalNodeContext: Node is optional if LOW_SharGrotto_ConfrontViconia_NoShadowheart previously covered the topic of the artefact sufficiently,

52.speaker: Shadowheart
52.text: Enough. I don't answer to you. Not anymore. I'm here for my family.
52.context: CinematicNodeContext: Viconia's brow raises as SH mentions her family.

130.speaker: Shadowheart
130.text: That's right. I know what you did. And it's not going to be quick - not for you.
130.context: NodeContext: She just told Viconia she knows her parents are alive.  'That's right' is following from Viconia's expression reacting to this.

148.speaker: Viconia DeVir
148.text: This is your family. And now you have turned your back on it.
148.context: CinematicNodeContext: Small sweep of her right hand at the general surrounds.NodeContext: Small sweep of her right hand at the general surrounds. Referring to the onlooking Shar worshippers

65.speaker: Viconia DeVir
65.text: The artefact was your last chance to prove yourself - and you squandered it.
65.context: CinematicNodeContext: Addressed to GROUP_Players rather than SHNodeContext: Addressed to GROUP_Players rather than SH. Referring to an earlier agreement they made to betray SH.

42.speaker: Player
42.text: Shadowheart has nothing to prove to the likes of you.
42.context: CinematicNodeContext: Addressed to GROUP_Players rather than SHNodeContext: Addressed to GROUP_Players rather than SH. Referring to an earlier agreement they made to betray SH.

0.speaker: Viconia DeVir
0.text: Curious, have you had a chance of heart? Or forgotten our little agreement? Turn this wayward child over to me, and you shall go free, with Lady Shar's faithful as your allies.
0.context: CinematicNodeContext: Addressed to GROUP_Players rather than SHNodeContext: Addressed to GROUP_Players rather than SH. Referring to an earlier agreement they made to betray SH.

108.speaker: Viconia DeVir
108.text: Such misplaced camaraderie. How about this - surrender this one to me, now, and you can leave freely, and consider Lady Shar's forces your allies in the battles to come.
108.context: CinematicNodeContext: Addressed to GROUP_Players rather than SHNodeContext: Addressed to GROUP_Players rather than SH. Offering them a way out if they betray SH.

145.speaker: Player
145.text: This was a mistake. We shouldn't have come here.
145.context: CinematicNodeContext: Addressed to GROUP_Players rather than SHNodeContext: Addressed to GROUP_Players rather than SH. Referring to an earlier agreement they made to betray SH.

76.speaker: Viconia DeVir
76.text: Fear not - remember the terms of our little agreement? Turn this wayward child over to me, and you shall go free, with Lady Shar's faithful as your allies.
76.context: CinematicNodeContext: Addressed to GROUP_Players rather than SHNodeContext: Addressed to GROUP_Players rather than SH. Referring to an earlier agreement they made to betray SH.

151.speaker: Viconia DeVir
151.text: You can still leave, if you are wise - surrender this one to me, now, and you can consider Lady Shar's forces your allies in the battles to come.
151.context: CinematicNodeContext: Addressed to GROUP_Players rather than SHNodeContext: Addressed to GROUP_Players rather than SH. Offering them a way out if they betray SH.

137.speaker: Player
137.text: Why is the artefact so important to you?
137.context: NodeContext: Defiant, addressed to Viconia (Enemy of Shar path - SH is here to save her parents)

93.speaker: Player
93.text: Shar bid you to do all of this?
93.context: NodeContext: Defiant, addressed to Viconia (Enemy of Shar path - SH is here to save her parents)

81.speaker: Shadowheart
81.text: Shar doesn't care. She was always going to use you and discard you - but now I'm going to deal with you first.
81.context: NodeContext: Defiant, addressed to Viconia (Enemy of Shar path - SH is here to save her parents)

119.speaker: Player
119.text: You thought you could best the Absolute? The githyanki?
119.context: NodeContext: Defiant, addressed to Viconia (Enemy of Shar path - SH is here to save her parents)

70.speaker: Shadowheart
70.text: I should thank you. If you hadn't sent me on that suicide mission, I'd never have learned the truth.
70.context: NodeContext: Defiant, addressed to Viconia (Enemy of Shar path - SH is here to save her parents)

100.speaker: Player
100.context: NodeContext: Defiant, glaring at Viconia while responding to Player  (Enemy of Shar path - SH is here to save her parents)

61.speaker: Shadowheart
61.context: NodeContext: Defiant, glaring at Viconia while responding to Player  (Enemy of Shar path - SH is here to save her parents)

13.speaker: Player
13.context: NodeContext: Outraged. The player is betraying Shadowheart Viconia in spite of promising not to do such a thing before.

9.speaker: Viconia DeVir
9.text: You there - remember our agreement? Surrender her to me, now, and you can consider Lady Shar's forces your allies in the battles to come.
9.context: NodeContext: Outraged. The player is betraying Shadowheart Viconia in spite of promising not to do such a thing before.

35.speaker: Player
35.context: NodeContext: Outraged. The player is betraying Shadowheart Viconia in spite of promising not to do such a thing before.

27.speaker: Shadowheart
27.text: No! Were you meaning to backstab me all along, or did you lose your spine along the way?
27.context: CinematicNodeContext: Two sharrans approach Shadowheart. The player watches as she's hauled away.

12.speaker: Viconia DeVir
12.text: You keep such shrewd companions, Shadowheart. A shame you didn't learn from them. Seize her.
12.context: CinematicNodeContext: Two sharrans approach Shadowheart. The player watches as she's hauled away.

95.speaker: Player
95.context: CinematicNodeContext: Viconia gestures for her followers to attackNodeContext: l-ill allure

41.speaker: Viconia DeVir
41.context: CinematicNodeContext: Viconia gestures for her followers to attackNodeContext: l-ill allure

141.speaker: Viconia DeVir
141.context: CinematicNodeContext: Viconia gestures for her followers to attackNodeContext: l-ill allure

75.speaker: Viconia DeVir
75.text: You there - surrender this one to me, now, and you can consider Lady Shar's forces your allies in the battles to come.

16.speaker: Viconia DeVir
16.text: I thought you might try to flee, rather than face us. Perhaps you are braver than I thought - or more arrogant than even I can fathom.
16.context: CinematicNodeContext: Viconia awaits SH. Shar followers watch from the sides.

103.speaker: Viconia DeVir
103.text: Now, do not be so foolish as to attack me. Unlike before, I am flesh and blood - but am very well protected.
103.context: NodeContext: Cautioning - reference to how the player attacked an illusion of Viconia earlier while not aware it wasn't actually her.

96.speaker: Player
96.text: You've finally found yourself a following, Mother Superior. And you only had to hollow out their heads to do it.
96.context: NodeContext: Mocking - Viconia is declaiming in front of an audience

98.speaker: Player
98.text: You've finally found yourself a following, Mother Superior. And you only had to hollow out their heads to do it.
98.context: NodeContext: Mocking - Viconia is declaiming in front of an audience

150.speaker: Jaheira
150.text: You've finally found yourself a following, Mother Superior. And you only had to hollow out their heads to do it.
150.context: NodeContext: Mocking - Viconia is declaiming in front of an audience

115.speaker: Minsc
115.text: Pin your eyes to the treacherous she-drow. Do not focus on the many, many others - Boo will handle them.
115.context: NodeContext: Low tones, strategising / advising player - the party will handle Viconia, Boo will take the dozens of other Sharrans in the gallery.

15.speaker: Viconia DeVir
15.text: Always a pleasure to see old acquaintances. But you would be wise to not interfere in this matter.
15.context: NodeContext: A little bittersweet, before hardening into a warning. Addressed to Minsc and/or Jaheira (old companions of hers from earlier games, shocked to see her again).

37.speaker: Player
37.text: No matter. You are here now, to face the Dark Lady's judgement, before a gathering of your peers. Give the artefact, and perhaps we will be merciful.
37.context: CinematicNodeContext: Murmurs reverberate from the onlooking Sharrans. Viconia scowls.

43.speaker: Player
43.text: No matter. You are here now, to face the Dark Lady's judgement, before a gathering of your peers. Give the artefact, and perhaps we will be merciful.
43.context: CinematicNodeContext: Murmurs reverberate from the onlooking Sharrans. Viconia scowls.

94.speaker: Viconia DeVir
94.text: No matter. You are here now, to face the Dark Lady's judgement, before a gathering of your peers. Give the artefact, and perhaps we will be merciful.
94.context: CinematicNodeContext: Murmurs reverberate from the onlooking Sharrans. Viconia scowls.

155.speaker: Shadowheart
155.text: No. I already faced Lady Shar. I passed her trials, I wielded her spear, and now I am her mortal voice. I have been embraced by her in ways you could only dream of.
155.context: CinematicNodeContext: Murmurs reverberate from the onlooking Sharrans. Viconia scowls.

47.speaker: Viconia DeVir
47.text: Nonsense. Ravings. You've strayed, girl - you've failed Lady Shar's mission and allowed ambition to rot your mind.
47.context: CinematicNodeContext: Murmurs reverberate from the onlooking Sharrans. Viconia scowls.

126.speaker: Shadowheart
126.text: Tell her. Tell them all. Tell them how the Nightsinger has blessed me.

147.speaker: Player
147.text: Wait. Before we go any further, tell me what this is about. Why do you even want the artefact?
147.context: NodeContext: Icy threat in the first sentence, then relenting a little - 'might as well toss 'em a bone'.

57.speaker: Viconia DeVir
57.text: I did not consent to questions. But I suppose you have undergone a great deal to reach this place, and anything I tell you cannot compromise me now - for you will either leave on my terms, or not at all...
57.context: NodeContext: Icy threat in the first sentence, then relenting a little - 'might as well toss 'em a bone'.

84.speaker: Viconia DeVir
84.text: Whispers reached my ears from all corners - potential rivals of Lady Shar, all vying for the same prize. A new god, amassing the disaffected, the outcasts - those who should turn to us.
84.context: NodeContext: Note of anger at the end - the Absolute is encrouching on her goddess's territory

132.speaker: Viconia DeVir
132.text: This 'Absolute' is but an upstart; disturbing the natural order and threatening to impede the glorious return of Lady Shar's pure, endless darkness.

101.speaker: Viconia DeVir
101.text: I had to act. I had to strangle that foul conspiracy while it was still in the cradle.

112.speaker: Viconia DeVir
112.text: We learned all we could - the artefact was the one thing the Absolutists feared. The one thing they desperately wanted to keep out of their enemies' grasp. I had to have it.

113.speaker: Player
113.text: Shar bid you to do all of this?
113.context: NodeContext: Hint of tension between her and her goddess. Their goals aren't aligned

24.speaker: Viconia DeVir
24.text: Lady Shar's concerns lie elsewhere - with another. But she is a goddess... she can afford to ignore that which does not threaten her.
24.context: NodeContext: Hint of tension between her and her goddess. Their goals aren't aligned

74.speaker: Viconia DeVir
74.text: I must keep her faith alive in mortal hearts. I must defend her ways, lead her children, stop all threats. Even if I must go against her wishes, I will prove myself her most loyal servant.

86.speaker: Shadowheart
86.text: You think you know better than the Dark Lady? No wonder she sent me to this place of your poison.
86.context: NodeContext: Defiant. Addressed to Viconia. (shar path - committed to her goddess and on a mission to overthrow her superior)

116.speaker: Player
116.text: You thought you could best the Absolute? The githyanki?
116.context: NodeContext: Defiant. Addressed to Viconia. (shar path - committed to her goddess and on a mission to overthrow her superior)

139.speaker: Viconia DeVir
139.text: To fight so many foes openly could prove unwise. Shar's children are better deployed as daggers in the shadows, not massed upon a battlefield.
139.context: NodeContext: Defiant. Addressed to Viconia. (shar path - committed to her goddess and on a mission to overthrow her superior)

17.speaker: Viconia DeVir
17.text: So let the others fight, while we wait. Once they are spent and bloodied from each other, we would slip in and take the prize. Alas, most of those I sent, perished. All but one.
17.context: NodeContext: Defiant. Addressed to Viconia. (shar path - committed to her goddess and on a mission to overthrow her superior)

152.speaker: Shadowheart
152.text: Lady Shar protected me. She guided me, elevated me. And now she wants me to cast you down.
152.context: NodeContext: Defiant. Addressed to Viconia. (shar path - committed to her goddess and on a mission to overthrow her superior)

118.speaker: Player
118.context: NodeContext: Addressed to the player, seeking support. (shar path - committed to her goddess and on a mission to overthrow her superior)

99.speaker: Shadowheart
99.text: Tell them what you witnessed. Tell them how Lady Shar favours me.
99.context: NodeContext: Addressed to the player, seeking support. (shar path - committed to her goddess and on a mission to overthrow her superior)

49.speaker: Player
49.text: It's true. She survived the Gauntlet of Shar. She sacrificed Selûne's own daughter. She is your rightful leader.
49.context: CinematicNodeContext: The sharrans' murmurs grow more animated. One shouts out in support.NodeContext: Supportive, swayed by the player's argument

127.speaker: Player
127.text: It's true. She survived the Gauntlet of Shar. She sacrificed Selûne's own daughter. She is your rightful leader.
127.context: CinematicNodeContext: The sharrans' murmurs grow more animated. One shouts out in support.NodeContext: Supportive, swayed by the player's argument

31.speaker: Player
31.text: It's true. She survived the Gauntlet of Shar. She sacrificed Selûne's own daughter. She is your rightful leader.
31.context: CinematicNodeContext: The sharrans' murmurs grow more animated. One shouts out in support.NodeContext: Supportive, swayed by the player's argument

4.speaker: Player
4.text: It's true. She survived the Gauntlet of Shar. She sacrificed Selûne's own daughter. She is your rightful leader.
4.context: CinematicNodeContext: The sharrans' murmurs grow more animated. One shouts out in support.NodeContext: Supportive, swayed by the player's argument

45.speaker: Player
45.text: It's true. She survived the Gauntlet of Shar. She sacrificed Selûne's own daughter. She is your rightful leader.
45.context: CinematicNodeContext: The sharrans' murmurs grow more animated. One shouts out in support.NodeContext: Supportive, swayed by the player's argument

136.speaker: Player
136.text: It's true. She survived the Gauntlet of Shar. She sacrificed Selûne's own daughter. She is your rightful leader.
136.context: CinematicNodeContext: The sharrans' murmurs grow more animated. One shouts out in support.NodeContext: Supportive, swayed by the player's argument

32.speaker: Player
32.text: It's true. She survived the Gauntlet of Shar. She sacrificed Selûne's own daughter. She is your rightful leader.
32.context: CinematicNodeContext: The sharrans' murmurs grow more animated. One shouts out in support.NodeContext: Supportive, swayed by the player's argument

20.speaker: Player
20.text: It's true. She survived the Gauntlet of Shar. She sacrificed Selûne's own daughter. She is your rightful leader.
20.context: CinematicNodeContext: The sharrans' murmurs grow more animated. One shouts out in support.NodeContext: Supportive, swayed by the player's argument

102.speaker: Player
102.text: I saw her walk through a shadow curse, where others feared to venture. Shar favours her.
102.context: CinematicNodeContext: The sharrans' murmurs grow more animated. One shouts out in support.NodeContext: Supportive, swayed by the player's argument

72.speaker: Player
72.text: I saw her walk through a shadow curse, where others feared to venture. Shar favours her.
72.context: CinematicNodeContext: The sharrans' murmurs grow more animated. One shouts out in support.NodeContext: Supportive, swayed by the player's argument

26.speaker: Player
26.text: I saw her walk through a shadow curse, where others feared to venture. Shar favours her.
26.context: CinematicNodeContext: The sharrans' murmurs grow more animated. One shouts out in support.NodeContext: Supportive, swayed by the player's argument

138.speaker: Player
138.text: I saw her walk through a shadow curse, where others feared to venture. Shar favours her.
138.context: CinematicNodeContext: The sharrans' murmurs grow more animated. One shouts out in support.NodeContext: Supportive, swayed by the player's argument

77.speaker: Player
77.text: I saw her walk through a shadow curse, where others feared to venture. Shar favours her.
77.context: CinematicNodeContext: The sharrans' murmurs grow more animated. One shouts out in support.NodeContext: Supportive, swayed by the player's argument

88.speaker: Player
88.text: I saw her walk through a shadow curse, where others feared to venture. Shar favours her.
88.context: CinematicNodeContext: The sharrans' murmurs grow more animated. One shouts out in support.NodeContext: Supportive, swayed by the player's argument

142.speaker: Player
142.text: I saw her walk through a shadow curse, where others feared to venture. Shar favours her.
142.context: CinematicNodeContext: The sharrans' murmurs grow more animated. One shouts out in support.NodeContext: Supportive, swayed by the player's argument

36.speaker: Player
36.text: I saw her walk through a shadow curse, where others feared to venture. Shar favours her.
36.context: CinematicNodeContext: The sharrans' murmurs grow more animated. One shouts out in support.NodeContext: Supportive, swayed by the player's argument

85.speaker: Viconia DeVir
85.text: A true Sharran like you must be on the right side.
85.context: CinematicNodeContext: The sharrans' murmurs grow more animated. One shouts out in support.NodeContext: Supportive, swayed by the player's argument

30.speaker: Justiciar Crusader Nightmist
30.text: A true Sharran like you must be on the right side.
30.context: CinematicNodeContext: The sharrans' murmurs grow more animated. One shouts out in support.NodeContext: Supportive, swayed by the player's argument

18.speaker: Justiciar Crusader Nightmist
18.context: CinematicNodeContext: A group of sharrans move to Shadowheart's back.NodeContext: Swearing fealty (having just changed sides to support the player)

135.speaker: Viconia DeVir
135.text: So be it. A traitor's end awaits you all. These are the desperate lies of trapped vermin, nothing more. You are deluded, girl.
135.context: CinematicNodeContext: Viconia watches angrily before shouting to the Sharrrans.NodeContext: First part (up to 'awaits you all') addressed to Sharrans who have abandoned her. Middle (up to 'nothing more' addressed to her remaining supporters. Last part directed at shadowheart.

149.text: You see? She is nothing but a deluded girl trying to bluff her way out of our rightful judgement - nothing more.
149.context: CinematicNodeContext: The onlooking Sharrans are unimpressed - none join Shadowheart's side. Viconia smiles and speaks to them.

69.speaker: Viconia DeVir
69.text: You see? She is nothing but a deluded girl trying to bluff her way out of our rightful judgement - nothing more.
69.context: CinematicNodeContext: The onlooking Sharrans are unimpressed - none join Shadowheart's side. Viconia smiles and speaks to them.

64.speaker: Player
64.text: She slew a helpless prisoner, deep in an ancient ruin. Perhaps that warrants Shar's blessing.
64.context: CinematicNodeContext: The onlooking Sharrans are unimpressed - none join Shadowheart's side. Viconia smiles and speaks to them.

56.speaker: Viconia DeVir
56.text: That's all? Why any back-alley cut-throat could earn the Dark Lady's blessing in those circumstances. You are deluded, girl.
56.context: CinematicNodeContext: The onlooking Sharrans are unimpressed - none join Shadowheart's side. Viconia smiles and speaks to them.

67.speaker: Shadowheart
67.text: I'm not here to convince you, Mother. You are already disgraced in Lady Shar's eyes. I merely wish to give the others a chance to repent, before they are dragged down with you.
67.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart gives you a small nod before speaking to the Sharrans.

125.speaker: Player
125.text: *A coup attempt. Shadowheart will need all the help she can get if she's to win over the remaining diehards from Viconia's ranks.*
125.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart gives you a small nod before speaking to the Sharrans.

66.text: *A coup attempt. Shadowheart will need all the help she can get if she's to win over the remaining diehards from Viconia's ranks.*
66.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart gives you a small nod before speaking to the Sharrans.

122.speaker: Narrator
122.text: *A coup attempt. Shadowheart will need all the help she can get if she's to win over the remaining diehards from Viconia's ranks.*
122.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart gives you a small nod before speaking to the Sharrans.

23.speaker: Player
23.text: Connect with her mind. Suggest she talk about the power Shar granted her.
23.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart gives you a small nod before speaking to the Sharrans.

120.speaker: Shadowheart
120.text: I sank a spear into the heart of the Moonwitch's daughter. Lady Shar rewarded me - she turned the pain that once held me back into the power that now drives me on.
120.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart gives you a small nod before speaking to the Sharrans.

48.speaker: Shadowheart
48.text: And she told me to cleanse her church of those who failed her.
48.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart points at Viconia on 'those who failed her'.

53.speaker: Viconia DeVir
53.text: The traitors' ranks swell - like a corpse left under the sun. I will take joy in making each and every one of you suffer.
53.context: CinematicNodeContext: Another group of Sharrans break from the fold and side with Shadowheart. There is perhaps now an even split between the two. Viconia lambasts those who changed sides.

131.speaker: Viconia DeVir
131.text: Enough talk, girl. The sooner we finish this, the sooner your blood can be sluiced off Lady Shar's sacred Grotto.

21.speaker: Player
21.text: Give Shadowheart a chance to sway more of Viconia's followers.
21.context: CinematicNodeContext: The final contingent of Viconia's followers abandon her.

140.speaker: Shadowheart
140.text: Enough speeches - the odds are already in my favour. Do you think the Dark Lady would want you to die for a lost cause? Or show some cunning and live another day?
140.context: CinematicNodeContext: The final contingent of Viconia's followers abandon her.

29.speaker: Viconia DeVir
29.text: No matter. I built this place from nothing - I can always start anew once you've been dealt with.
29.context: CinematicNodeContext: The final contingent of Viconia's followers abandon her.

114.speaker: Viconia DeVir
114.text: You were right about one thing - Lady Shar's church does need to be cleansed. By my hand.

59.speaker: Player
59.text: Wait - I have to know, before it's too late. Why did you want the Astral Prism?
59.context: CinematicNodeContext: Viconia gestures for her followers to attackNodeContext: l-ill allure

91.speaker: Player
91.text: Shar bid you to do all of this?

38.speaker: Player
38.text: You thought you could best the Absolute? The githyanki?

11.speaker: Player
11.text: I've heard enough. Deal with this lot how you wish, Shadowheart.

123.speaker: Player
123.context: CinematicNodeContext: Viconia gestures for her followers to attackNodeContext: l-ill allure

44.speaker: Viconia DeVir
44.context: CinematicNodeContext: Viconia gestures for her followers to attackNodeContext: l-ill allure

50.speaker: Player
50.text: Use the parasite. Urge Shadowheart to speak of the Absolute threat. Only she can lead them to victory.
50.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart addresses the Sharran audience

34.speaker: Shadowheart
34.text: Viconia would have you hide down here, oblivious to the true danger - the Absolute must be stopped, and only I can lead you. Lady Shar has decreed it!
34.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart addresses the Sharran audience

78.speaker: Viconia DeVir
78.text: The Absolute will be dealt with. As soon as I prise the artefact from your cold fingers.
78.context: CinematicNodeContext: The onlooking Sharrans are unimpressed - none join Shadowheart's side. Viconia smiles and speaks to them.

87.speaker: Player
87.text: I don't know what she's talking about.

111.speaker: Player
111.text: I said I'd bring you Shadowheart - she's all yours.
